statements: SELECT * FROM StudentAttendance WHERE student_id = 1
SELECT student_id, attendance_date FROM StudentAttendance WHERE participation_score > 80
SELECT student_id, attendance_date, participation_score FROM StudentAttendance WHERE student_id IN (1, 2, 3)
SELECT attendance_date, student_id, participation_score FROM StudentAttendance WHERE participation_score < 50
SELECT * FROM StudentAttendance WHERE attendance_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31'
SELECT * FROM StudentAttendance WHERE attendance_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31' ORDER BY student_id DESC, attendance_date
SELECT student_id, participation_score FROM StudentAttendance WHERE participation_score > 80 ORDER BY participation_score DESC
SELECT student_id, attendance_date, participation_score FROM StudentAttendance WHERE student_id = 101 ORDER BY attendance_date
SELECT MAX(participation_score) AS highest_score FROM StudentAttendance
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_records FROM StudentAttendance
SELECT * FROM Students;
SELECT student_name, student_email FROM Students ORDER BY student_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM Discussions WHERE discussion_date >= '2023-01-01';
SELECT discussion_topic, student_id FROM Discussions ORDER BY discussion_id DESC;
SELECT student_name, student_email FROM Students WHERE student_email LIKE '%gmail.com%';
SELECT * FROM Students WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT student_name, student_email FROM Students WHERE student_id > 5 ORDER BY student_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM Students JOIN Discussions ON Students.student_id = Discussions.student_id WHERE Discussions.discussion_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY Discussions.discussion_date ASC;

SELECT student_name, discussion_topic FROM Students JOIN Discussions ON Students.student_id = Discussions.student_id WHERE Students.student_name LIKE '%John%' OR Discussions.discussion_topic LIKE '%Database%';

SELECT student_id, student_name, COUNT(discussion_id) AS discussion_count FROM Students LEFT JOIN Discussions ON Students.student_id = Discussions.student_id GROUP BY student_id HAVING discussion_count > 2 ORDER BY discussion_count DESC, student_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM students;
SELECT student_name, email FROM students;
SELECT student_name, email FROM students WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM attendance WHERE present = true;
SELECT topic, date FROM discussions WHERE participant_id = 3;
SELECT student_name, email FROM students WHERE student_id = 1
SELECT * FROM students WHERE student_name LIKE 'J%'
SELECT * FROM students ORDER BY student_name DESC
SELECT topic, date FROM discussions WHERE participant_id = 1
SELECT student_name, date FROM students JOIN attendance ON students.student_id = attendance.student_id WHERE present = TRUE
SELECT * FROM students;
SELECT name, email FROM students WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT class_id, class_name FROM classes ORDER BY class_id DESC;
SELECT student_id, attendance_id FROM attendance WHERE attended = TRUE;
SELECT topic, participation_score FROM discussions WHERE participation_score > 80;
SELECT * FROM students ORDER BY student_id DESC;
SELECT name, email FROM students WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT student_id, name, class_name FROM students JOIN classes ON students.student_id = classes.class_id WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT class_id, AVG(participation_score) AS avg_score FROM discussions GROUP BY class_id;
SELECT student_id, COUNT(DISTINCT class_id) AS classes_attended FROM attendance WHERE attended = 'true' GROUP BY student_id HAVING COUNT(DISTINCT class_id) > 1;
SELECT * FROM students;
SELECT student_name, email FROM students;
SELECT * FROM classes WHERE class_description IS NOT NULL;
SELECT student_name, email, participation_score FROM students JOIN participation ON students.student_id = participation.student_id;
SELECT class_name, topic, date FROM classes JOIN discussions ON classes.class_id = discussions.class_id;
SELECT * FROM students;
SELECT student_name, email FROM students WHERE student_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT student_name, email FROM students WHERE student_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT * FROM classes ORDER BY class_name DESC;
SELECT class_name, class_description FROM classes WHERE class_description IS NOT NULL;
